dict.acceptation: 原则，原理；准则，道义；道德标准；本能；

sent.orig: Drawer principle, be called again drawer principle, columbine basket principle or shoe box principle.
sent.trans: 抽屉原理，又被称为抽屉原则，鸽笼原理或鞋盒原理。

sent.orig: Broadly-defined Principle of proportion includes appropriate principle, necessity principle and narrowly-defined Principle of proportion.
sent.trans: 广义的比例原则包括适当性原则、要性原则和狭义的比例原则。

sent.orig: Mainly has four principles, namely usable principle, gradual principle, valid principle, modularity principle.
sent.trans: 主要有四个原则，即实用性原则、渐进性原则、有效性原则、模块性原则。

sent.orig: Financial administration principles include ordinary principle, concrete principle and special principle according to its function.
sent.trans: 财务管理原则按照其作用可以分为一般原则、具体原则和特殊事项处理原则三部分。

sent.orig: Principle of MFN treatment, principle of national treatment and principle of transparency are dealt with first.
sent.trans: 服务原产地规则的原则包括最惠国待遇原则、国民待遇原则和透明度原则。
